description: Manage your Discord communities from one place. Browse servers and channels, view members and user details, send or read messages, and add reactions. Create and delete channels, assign roles, and moderate content with message deletion and timeouts.

configSchema.title: ConfigSchema

discordToken.description: Discord bot token with the required privileged intents enabled. Omit this when the DISCORD_TOKEN environment variable is set.

defaultGuildId.description: Optional default Discord server (guild) ID used when a tool call omits server_id.

configSchema.description: Session configuration for the Discord MCP server.

capabilities.name: list_servers
capabilities.description: List the Discord servers the bot is currently connected to.

capabilities.name: get_server_info
capabilities.description: Retrieve detailed information about a Discord server.

capabilities.name: get_channels
capabilities.description: List channels for a Discord server grouped by category.

capabilities.name: list_roles
capabilities.description: List all roles defined in the Discord server.

capabilities.name: list_members
capabilities.description: List members of a Discord server.

capabilities.name: get_user_info
capabilities.description: Fetch information about a specific Discord user.

capabilities.name: send_message
capabilities.description: Send a message to a Discord text channel or thread.

capabilities.name: read_messages
capabilities.description: Read recent messages from a channel.

capabilities.name: add_reaction
capabilities.description: Add a reaction to a specific message.

capabilities.name: add_multiple_reactions
capabilities.description: Add multiple reactions to a message.

capabilities.name: remove_reaction
capabilities.description: Remove the bot's reaction from a message.

capabilities.name: pin_message
capabilities.description: Pin a message in a text channel.

capabilities.name: unpin_message
capabilities.description: Unpin a message in a text channel.

capabilities.name: bulk_delete_messages
capabilities.description: Delete multiple recent messages from a channel.

capabilities.name: create_text_channel
capabilities.description: Create a new text channel in the specified server.

capabilities.name: create_voice_channel
capabilities.description: Create a new voice channel in the specified server.

capabilities.name: create_stage_channel
capabilities.description: Create a new stage channel for events and announcements.

capabilities.name: create_category
capabilities.description: Create a new channel category.

capabilities.name: update_channel
capabilities.description: Update channel settings such as name, topic, and category.

capabilities.name: delete_channel
capabilities.description: Delete a Discord channel.

capabilities.name: create_invite
capabilities.description: Create an invite link for a channel.

capabilities.name: list_invites
capabilities.description: List active invites for a server.

capabilities.name: create_role
capabilities.description: Create a new role in the specified server.

capabilities.name: edit_role
capabilities.description: Update the configuration of an existing role.

capabilities.name: delete_role
capabilities.description: Delete a role from the server.

capabilities.name: add_role
capabilities.description: Add a role to a Discord user.

capabilities.name: remove_role
capabilities.description: Remove a role from a Discord user.

capabilities.name: kick_member
capabilities.description: Kick a member from the server.

capabilities.name: ban_member
capabilities.description: Ban a user from the server.

capabilities.name: unban_member
capabilities.description: Remove a ban for a user.

capabilities.name: list_bans
capabilities.description: List banned users for the server.

capabilities.name: timeout_member
capabilities.description: Apply or clear a communication timeout for a member.

capabilities.name: moderate_message
capabilities.description: Moderate a message by deleting it and optionally timing out the author.
